p: At the Czech and the German sites, the amount of damage was the same among the regions of plant origin (Table 2). At the Dutch site in the novel range, the Czech plants from the core were eaten more compared to plants from the novel range of Germany (in August) or the Netherlands (in June) (Table 2, post hoc Tukey test P < 0.05). Plant biomass was negatively correlated with the amount of herbivore damage (plants in herbivory treatment: R s = −0.15, N = 315, P = 0.008).
